#### `824ce2f094e9d2e44f7bc373abd1f478420fa07a0125e732e89fe27841340548`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \

			| sort -u \
			| xargs -r apk info --installed \
			| sort -u \
	)" \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .php-rundeps $runDeps \
	&& apk del .build-deps

#### `9855b12c17d56fb2fad2df1b6b048633187977e251a96f00b88e9d293416611f`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps \
		$PHPIZE_DEPS \
		curl-dev \
		gnupg \
		libedit-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		openssl-dev \
		sqlite-dev \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src \
	&& tar -Jxf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src \
	&& mv "/usr/src/php-$PHP_VERSION" /usr/src/php \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -perm +0111 -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& runDeps="$( \
		scanelf --needed --nobanner --recursive /usr/local \
			| awk '{ gsub(/,/, "\nso:", $2); print "so:" $2 }' \
			| sort -u \
			| xargs -r apk info --installed \
			| sort -u \
	)" \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .php-rundeps $runDeps \
	&& apk del .build-deps
```

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

#### `68fc78792e39bfaabec25b0edccd2ed24f55e2f49fc9aa90b3f6c618a012c606`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

```dockerfile
RUN set -ex \
	&& cd /usr/local/etc \
	&& if [ -d php-fpm.d ]; then \
		sed 's!=NONE/!=!g' php-fpm.conf.default | tee php-fpm.conf > /dev/null; \
		cp php-fpm.d/www.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
	else \
		mkdir php-fpm.d; \
		cp php-fpm.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
		{ \
			echo '[global]'; \
			echo 'include=etc/php-fpm.d/*.conf'; \
		} | tee php-fpm.conf; \
	fi \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'error_log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo '; if we send this to /proc/self/fd/1, it never appears'; \
		echo 'access.log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo 'clear_env = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '; Ensure worker stdout and stderr are sent to the main error log.'; \
		echo 'catch_workers_output = yes'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/docker.conf \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'daemonize = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo 'listen = [::]:9000'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/zz-docker.conf
```

```dockerfile
RUN set -ex \
	&& cd /usr/local/etc \
	&& if [ -d php-fpm.d ]; then \
		sed 's!=NONE/!=!g' php-fpm.conf.default | tee php-fpm.conf > /dev/null; \
		cp php-fpm.d/www.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
	else \
		mkdir php-fpm.d; \
		cp php-fpm.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
		{ \
			echo '[global]'; \
			echo 'include=etc/php-fpm.d/*.conf'; \
		} | tee php-fpm.conf; \
	fi \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'error_log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo '; if we send this to /proc/self/fd/1, it never appears'; \
		echo 'access.log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo 'clear_env = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '; Ensure worker stdout and stderr are sent to the main error log.'; \
		echo 'catch_workers_output = yes'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/docker.conf \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'daemonize = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo 'listen = [::]:9000'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/zz-docker.conf

#### `1ab1396b209231f08f2e31d0f2f6230d89bde20505c0fd0c5d5231dec036b85f`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps \
		$PHPIZE_DEPS \
		curl-dev \
		gnupg \
		libedit-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		openssl-dev \
		sqlite-dev \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src \
	&& tar -Jxf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src \
	&& mv "/usr/src/php-$PHP_VERSION" /usr/src/php \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -perm +0111 -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& runDeps="$( \
		scanelf --needed --nobanner --recursive /usr/local \
			| awk '{ gsub(/,/, "\nso:", $2); print "so:" $2 }' \
			| sort -u \
			| xargs -r apk info --installed \
			| sort -u \
	)" \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .php-rundeps $runDeps \
	&& apk del .build-deps
```

	&& cd /usr/local/etc \
	&& if [ -d php-fpm.d ]; then \
		sed 's!=NONE/!=!g' php-fpm.conf.default | tee php-fpm.conf > /dev/null; \
		cp php-fpm.d/www.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
	else \
		mkdir php-fpm.d; \
		cp php-fpm.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
		{ \
			echo '[global]'; \
			echo 'include=etc/php-fpm.d/*.conf'; \
		} | tee php-fpm.conf; \
	fi \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'error_log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo '; if we send this to /proc/self/fd/1, it never appears'; \
		echo 'access.log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo 'clear_env = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '; Ensure worker stdout and stderr are sent to the main error log.'; \
		echo 'catch_workers_output = yes'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/docker.conf \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'daemonize = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo 'listen = [::]:9000'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/zz-docker.conf

#### `fc52b08938526b2769d3c43477170494b1c579a7f15cdb828e17874d00e38bd8`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

#### `fecc7112a679a4f4845d605c20ba52f710a8eb0042bf8b232d4d450b0684c666`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps \
		$PHPIZE_DEPS \
		curl-dev \
		gnupg \
		libedit-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		openssl-dev \
		sqlite-dev \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src \
	&& tar -Jxf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src \
	&& mv "/usr/src/php-$PHP_VERSION" /usr/src/php \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -perm +0111 -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& runDeps="$( \
		scanelf --needed --nobanner --recursive /usr/local \
			| awk '{ gsub(/,/, "\nso:", $2); print "so:" $2 }' \
			| sort -u \
			| xargs -r apk info --installed \
			| sort -u \
	)" \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .php-rundeps $runDeps \
	&& apk del .build-deps
```

#### `20b117a6daf20baa1e57f10c82389bec73ed767067b604f8602e9fc9cd2ae840`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

#### `20b117a6daf20baa1e57f10c82389bec73ed767067b604f8602e9fc9cd2ae840`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

#### `20b117a6daf20baa1e57f10c82389bec73ed767067b604f8602e9fc9cd2ae840`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

#### `98684547d275de584b6673b51cd64be3f4fb4cc5042815c5a36ca7e2aaefe913`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps \
		$PHPIZE_DEPS \
		curl-dev \
		gnupg \
		libedit-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		openssl-dev \
		sqlite-dev \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src \
	&& tar -Jxf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src \
	&& mv "/usr/src/php-$PHP_VERSION" /usr/src/php \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -perm +0111 -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& runDeps="$( \
		scanelf --needed --nobanner --recursive /usr/local \
			| awk '{ gsub(/,/, "\nso:", $2); print "so:" $2 }' \
			| sort -u \
			| xargs -r apk info --installed \
			| sort -u \
	)" \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .php-rundeps $runDeps \
	&& apk del .build-deps
```

#### `98684547d275de584b6673b51cd64be3f4fb4cc5042815c5a36ca7e2aaefe913`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps \
		$PHPIZE_DEPS \
		curl-dev \
		gnupg \
		libedit-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		openssl-dev \
		sqlite-dev \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src \
	&& tar -Jxf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src \
	&& mv "/usr/src/php-$PHP_VERSION" /usr/src/php \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -perm +0111 -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& runDeps="$( \
		scanelf --needed --nobanner --recursive /usr/local \
			| awk '{ gsub(/,/, "\nso:", $2); print "so:" $2 }' \
			| sort -u \
			| xargs -r apk info --installed \
			| sort -u \
	)" \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .php-rundeps $runDeps \
	&& apk del .build-deps
```

#### `a087163553e365f2a7f72e825e99422bbf85cf3788f0af84b6f6c656ad1c5264`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

#### `1d5ac25b3f4194163a0cad1e7e507ff4f841dd6e149ecce133b0200a92ceb978`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

	&& cd /usr/local/etc \
	&& if [ -d php-fpm.d ]; then \
		sed 's!=NONE/!=!g' php-fpm.conf.default | tee php-fpm.conf > /dev/null; \
		cp php-fpm.d/www.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
	else \
		mkdir php-fpm.d; \
		cp php-fpm.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
		{ \
			echo '[global]'; \
			echo 'include=etc/php-fpm.d/*.conf'; \
		} | tee php-fpm.conf; \
	fi \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'error_log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo '; if we send this to /proc/self/fd/1, it never appears'; \
		echo 'access.log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo 'clear_env = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '; Ensure worker stdout and stderr are sent to the main error log.'; \
		echo 'catch_workers_output = yes'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/docker.conf \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'daemonize = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo 'listen = [::]:9000'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/zz-docker.conf
```

#### `1d5ac25b3f4194163a0cad1e7e507ff4f841dd6e149ecce133b0200a92ceb978`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

#### `72e6e9893b57496fcefc135f7e81966767ea1a0d7a33e9c9bbbbcb279f05ac25`

```dockerfile
RUN set -ex \
	&& cd /usr/local/etc \
	&& if [ -d php-fpm.d ]; then \
		sed 's!=NONE/!=!g' php-fpm.conf.default | tee php-fpm.conf > /dev/null; \
		cp php-fpm.d/www.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
	else \
		mkdir php-fpm.d; \
		cp php-fpm.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
		{ \
			echo '[global]'; \
			echo 'include=etc/php-fpm.d/*.conf'; \
		} | tee php-fpm.conf; \
	fi \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'error_log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo '; if we send this to /proc/self/fd/1, it never appears'; \
		echo 'access.log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo 'clear_env = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '; Ensure worker stdout and stderr are sent to the main error log.'; \
		echo 'catch_workers_output = yes'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/docker.conf \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'daemonize = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo 'listen = [::]:9000'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/zz-docker.conf
```

#### `69768c1d1a17708d9b2a280f22501326db226192ab9f195617c835d542987c7e`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps \
		$PHPIZE_DEPS \
		curl-dev \
		gnupg \
		libedit-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		openssl-dev \
		sqlite-dev \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src \
	&& tar -Jxf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src \
	&& mv "/usr/src/php-$PHP_VERSION" /usr/src/php \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -perm +0111 -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& runDeps="$( \
		scanelf --needed --nobanner --recursive /usr/local \
			| awk '{ gsub(/,/, "\nso:", $2); print "so:" $2 }' \
			| sort -u \
			| xargs -r apk info --installed \
			| sort -u \
	)" \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .php-rundeps $runDeps \
	&& apk del .build-deps
```

#### `69768c1d1a17708d9b2a280f22501326db226192ab9f195617c835d542987c7e`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps \
		$PHPIZE_DEPS \
		curl-dev \
		gnupg \
		libedit-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		openssl-dev \
		sqlite-dev \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src \
	&& tar -Jxf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src \
	&& mv "/usr/src/php-$PHP_VERSION" /usr/src/php \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -perm +0111 -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& runDeps="$( \
		scanelf --needed --nobanner --recursive /usr/local \
			| awk '{ gsub(/,/, "\nso:", $2); print "so:" $2 }' \
			| sort -u \
			| xargs -r apk info --installed \
			| sort -u \
	)" \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .php-rundeps $runDeps \
	&& apk del .build-deps
```

```dockerfile
RUN set -ex \
	&& cd /usr/local/etc \
	&& if [ -d php-fpm.d ]; then \
		sed 's!=NONE/!=!g' php-fpm.conf.default | tee php-fpm.conf > /dev/null; \
		cp php-fpm.d/www.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
	else \
		mkdir php-fpm.d; \
		cp php-fpm.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
		{ \
			echo '[global]'; \
			echo 'include=etc/php-fpm.d/*.conf'; \
		} | tee php-fpm.conf; \
	fi \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'error_log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo '; if we send this to /proc/self/fd/1, it never appears'; \
		echo 'access.log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo 'clear_env = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '; Ensure worker stdout and stderr are sent to the main error log.'; \
		echo 'catch_workers_output = yes'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/docker.conf \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'daemonize = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo 'listen = [::]:9000'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/zz-docker.conf
```

	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \

		libssl-dev \

	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps

#### `60e997299b14aa6da237921ef82c6a66db5dabb574ca3657235f3a60414dabef`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

#### `7b3295ef75735f02dd3286c48aa869297ffcc1c3a6774ebcea92ddd1561c8a04`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps \
		$PHPIZE_DEPS \
		curl-dev \
		gnupg \
		libedit-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		openssl-dev \
		sqlite-dev \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src \
	&& tar -Jxf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src \
	&& mv "/usr/src/php-$PHP_VERSION" /usr/src/php \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -perm +0111 -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& runDeps="$( \
		scanelf --needed --nobanner --recursive /usr/local \
			| awk '{ gsub(/,/, "\nso:", $2); print "so:" $2 }' \
			| sort -u \
			| xargs -r apk info --installed \
			| sort -u \
	)" \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .php-rundeps $runDeps \
	&& apk del .build-deps
```

#### `7b3295ef75735f02dd3286c48aa869297ffcc1c3a6774ebcea92ddd1561c8a04`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps \
		$PHPIZE_DEPS \
		curl-dev \
		gnupg \
		libedit-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		openssl-dev \
		sqlite-dev \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src \
	&& tar -Jxf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src \
	&& mv "/usr/src/php-$PHP_VERSION" /usr/src/php \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -perm +0111 -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& runDeps="$( \
		scanelf --needed --nobanner --recursive /usr/local \
			| awk '{ gsub(/,/, "\nso:", $2); print "so:" $2 }' \
			| sort -u \
			| xargs -r apk info --installed \
			| sort -u \
	)" \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .php-rundeps $runDeps \
	&& apk del .build-deps
```

#### `b0488df94ee9e13e02ba14ad2eefe7d69c7abc814e1d27131f9799963d790d17`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

#### `b0488df94ee9e13e02ba14ad2eefe7d69c7abc814e1d27131f9799963d790d17`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

#### `b0488df94ee9e13e02ba14ad2eefe7d69c7abc814e1d27131f9799963d790d17`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

-	Created: Sat, 28 May 2016 00:33:42 GMT

#### `b0488df94ee9e13e02ba14ad2eefe7d69c7abc814e1d27131f9799963d790d17`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

RUN set -xe \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps \
		$PHPIZE_DEPS \
		curl-dev \
		gnupg \
		libedit-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		openssl-dev \
		sqlite-dev \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src \
	&& tar -Jxf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src \
	&& mv "/usr/src/php-$PHP_VERSION" /usr/src/php \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -perm +0111 -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& runDeps="$( \
		scanelf --needed --nobanner --recursive /usr/local \
			| awk '{ gsub(/,/, "\nso:", $2); print "so:" $2 }' \
			| sort -u \
			| xargs -r apk info --installed \
			| sort -u \
	)" \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .php-rundeps $runDeps \
	&& apk del .build-deps

#### `7308e41185ecf0810073995b28139a6777b32a347f3960bda57183c1bdf5ae38`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps \
		$PHPIZE_DEPS \
		curl-dev \
		gnupg \
		libedit-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		openssl-dev \
		sqlite-dev \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src \
	&& tar -Jxf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src \
	&& mv "/usr/src/php-$PHP_VERSION" /usr/src/php \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -perm +0111 -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& runDeps="$( \
		scanelf --needed --nobanner --recursive /usr/local \
			| awk '{ gsub(/,/, "\nso:", $2); print "so:" $2 }' \
			| sort -u \
			| xargs -r apk info --installed \
			| sort -u \
	)" \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .php-rundeps $runDeps \
	&& apk del .build-deps
```

RUN set -xe \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps \
		$PHPIZE_DEPS \
		curl-dev \
		gnupg \
		libedit-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		openssl-dev \
		sqlite-dev \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src \
	&& tar -Jxf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src \
	&& mv "/usr/src/php-$PHP_VERSION" /usr/src/php \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -perm +0111 -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& runDeps="$( \
		scanelf --needed --nobanner --recursive /usr/local \
			| awk '{ gsub(/,/, "\nso:", $2); print "so:" $2 }' \
			| sort -u \
			| xargs -r apk info --installed \
			| sort -u \
	)" \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .php-rundeps $runDeps \
	&& apk del .build-deps

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

#### `de4fedf0ed8edfa2b812858285bafd060a1fba3b7f8bb641f2d1faeb693862f9`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

#### `e522f501e58c05d6b6f3872f0e3534bb9afbc91af69ec0dc97ecc73c3190279d`

```dockerfile
RUN set -ex \
	&& cd /usr/local/etc \
	&& if [ -d php-fpm.d ]; then \
		sed 's!=NONE/!=!g' php-fpm.conf.default | tee php-fpm.conf > /dev/null; \
		cp php-fpm.d/www.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
	else \
		mkdir php-fpm.d; \
		cp php-fpm.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
		{ \
			echo '[global]'; \
			echo 'include=etc/php-fpm.d/*.conf'; \
		} | tee php-fpm.conf; \
	fi \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'error_log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo '; if we send this to /proc/self/fd/1, it never appears'; \
		echo 'access.log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo 'clear_env = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '; Ensure worker stdout and stderr are sent to the main error log.'; \
		echo 'catch_workers_output = yes'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/docker.conf \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'daemonize = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo 'listen = [::]:9000'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/zz-docker.conf
```

#### `e522f501e58c05d6b6f3872f0e3534bb9afbc91af69ec0dc97ecc73c3190279d`

```dockerfile
RUN set -ex \
	&& cd /usr/local/etc \
	&& if [ -d php-fpm.d ]; then \
		sed 's!=NONE/!=!g' php-fpm.conf.default | tee php-fpm.conf > /dev/null; \
		cp php-fpm.d/www.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
	else \
		mkdir php-fpm.d; \
		cp php-fpm.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
		{ \
			echo '[global]'; \
			echo 'include=etc/php-fpm.d/*.conf'; \
		} | tee php-fpm.conf; \
	fi \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'error_log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo '; if we send this to /proc/self/fd/1, it never appears'; \
		echo 'access.log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo 'clear_env = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '; Ensure worker stdout and stderr are sent to the main error log.'; \
		echo 'catch_workers_output = yes'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/docker.conf \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'daemonize = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo 'listen = [::]:9000'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/zz-docker.conf
```

#### `de4fedf0ed8edfa2b812858285bafd060a1fba3b7f8bb641f2d1faeb693862f9`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

	&& cd /usr/local/etc \
	&& if [ -d php-fpm.d ]; then \
		sed 's!=NONE/!=!g' php-fpm.conf.default | tee php-fpm.conf > /dev/null; \
		cp php-fpm.d/www.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
	else \

		cp php-fpm.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
		{ \
			echo '[global]'; \
			echo 'include=etc/php-fpm.d/*.conf'; \
		} | tee php-fpm.conf; \
	fi \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'error_log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo '; if we send this to /proc/self/fd/1, it never appears'; \
		echo 'access.log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo 'clear_env = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '; Ensure worker stdout and stderr are sent to the main error log.'; \
		echo 'catch_workers_output = yes'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/docker.conf \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'daemonize = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo 'listen = [::]:9000'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/zz-docker.conf

#### `c5d1f2879510702a10eb518442715f75968385d03269df8b6d418e20c46bae2b`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps \
		$PHPIZE_DEPS \
		curl-dev \
		gnupg \
		libedit-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		openssl-dev \
		sqlite-dev \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src \
	&& tar -Jxf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src \
	&& mv "/usr/src/php-$PHP_VERSION" /usr/src/php \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -perm +0111 -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& runDeps="$( \
		scanelf --needed --nobanner --recursive /usr/local \
			| awk '{ gsub(/,/, "\nso:", $2); print "so:" $2 }' \
			| sort -u \
			| xargs -r apk info --installed \
			| sort -u \
	)" \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .php-rundeps $runDeps \
	&& apk del .build-deps
```

#### `4514f224aded795ac3f53a15cfd717e8472d62cbafa77b8dbcbfc866b8b04849`

```dockerfile
RUN set -ex \
	&& cd /usr/local/etc \
	&& if [ -d php-fpm.d ]; then \
		sed 's!=NONE/!=!g' php-fpm.conf.default | tee php-fpm.conf > /dev/null; \
		cp php-fpm.d/www.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
	else \
		mkdir php-fpm.d; \
		cp php-fpm.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
		{ \
			echo '[global]'; \
			echo 'include=etc/php-fpm.d/*.conf'; \
		} | tee php-fpm.conf; \
	fi \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'error_log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo '; if we send this to /proc/self/fd/1, it never appears'; \
		echo 'access.log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo 'clear_env = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '; Ensure worker stdout and stderr are sent to the main error log.'; \
		echo 'catch_workers_output = yes'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/docker.conf \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'daemonize = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo 'listen = [::]:9000'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/zz-docker.conf
```

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps \
		$PHPIZE_DEPS \
		curl-dev \
		gnupg \
		libedit-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		openssl-dev \
		sqlite-dev \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src \
	&& tar -Jxf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src \
	&& mv "/usr/src/php-$PHP_VERSION" /usr/src/php \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -perm +0111 -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& runDeps="$( \
		scanelf --needed --nobanner --recursive /usr/local \
			| awk '{ gsub(/,/, "\nso:", $2); print "so:" $2 }' \
			| sort -u \
			| xargs -r apk info --installed \
			| sort -u \
	)" \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .php-rundeps $runDeps \
	&& apk del .build-deps
```

RUN set -ex \
	&& cd /usr/local/etc \
	&& if [ -d php-fpm.d ]; then \
		sed 's!=NONE/!=!g' php-fpm.conf.default | tee php-fpm.conf > /dev/null; \
		cp php-fpm.d/www.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
	else \
		mkdir php-fpm.d; \
		cp php-fpm.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
		{ \
			echo '[global]'; \
			echo 'include=etc/php-fpm.d/*.conf'; \
		} | tee php-fpm.conf; \
	fi \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'error_log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo '; if we send this to /proc/self/fd/1, it never appears'; \
		echo 'access.log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo 'clear_env = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '; Ensure worker stdout and stderr are sent to the main error log.'; \
		echo 'catch_workers_output = yes'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/docker.conf \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'daemonize = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo 'listen = [::]:9000'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/zz-docker.conf
```

#### `c5d1f2879510702a10eb518442715f75968385d03269df8b6d418e20c46bae2b`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps \
		$PHPIZE_DEPS \
		curl-dev \
		gnupg \
		libedit-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		openssl-dev \
		sqlite-dev \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src \
	&& tar -Jxf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src \
	&& mv "/usr/src/php-$PHP_VERSION" /usr/src/php \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -perm +0111 -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& runDeps="$( \
		scanelf --needed --nobanner --recursive /usr/local \
			| awk '{ gsub(/,/, "\nso:", $2); print "so:" $2 }' \
			| sort -u \
			| xargs -r apk info --installed \
			| sort -u \
	)" \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .php-rundeps $runDeps \
	&& apk del .build-deps
```

	&& cd /usr/local/etc \
	&& if [ -d php-fpm.d ]; then \
		sed 's!=NONE/!=!g' php-fpm.conf.default | tee php-fpm.conf > /dev/null; \
		cp php-fpm.d/www.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
	else \

		cp php-fpm.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
		{ \
			echo '[global]'; \
			echo 'include=etc/php-fpm.d/*.conf'; \
		} | tee php-fpm.conf; \
	fi \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'error_log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo '; if we send this to /proc/self/fd/1, it never appears'; \
		echo 'access.log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo 'clear_env = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '; Ensure worker stdout and stderr are sent to the main error log.'; \
		echo 'catch_workers_output = yes'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/docker.conf \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'daemonize = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo 'listen = [::]:9000'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/zz-docker.conf

#### `65b97264a384d4403481fd8c1ea0e4d66676c3b3d84ec1f036954123161145bf`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

#### `65b97264a384d4403481fd8c1ea0e4d66676c3b3d84ec1f036954123161145bf`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps \
		$PHPIZE_DEPS \
		curl-dev \
		gnupg \
		libedit-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		openssl-dev \
		sqlite-dev \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src \
	&& tar -Jxf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src \
	&& mv "/usr/src/php-$PHP_VERSION" /usr/src/php \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -perm +0111 -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& runDeps="$( \
		scanelf --needed --nobanner --recursive /usr/local \
			| awk '{ gsub(/,/, "\nso:", $2); print "so:" $2 }' \
			| sort -u \
			| xargs -r apk info --installed \
			| sort -u \
	)" \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .php-rundeps $runDeps \
	&& apk del .build-deps
```

#### `b7dddb90fd2257e7adb5dc4b44c42447d989f4a99450dfbbb70860e40073d506`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps \
		$PHPIZE_DEPS \
		curl-dev \
		gnupg \
		libedit-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		openssl-dev \
		sqlite-dev \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src \
	&& tar -Jxf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src \
	&& mv "/usr/src/php-$PHP_VERSION" /usr/src/php \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -perm +0111 -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& runDeps="$( \
		scanelf --needed --nobanner --recursive /usr/local \
			| awk '{ gsub(/,/, "\nso:", $2); print "so:" $2 }' \
			| sort -u \
			| xargs -r apk info --installed \
			| sort -u \
	)" \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .php-rundeps $runDeps \
	&& apk del .build-deps
```
